name: Kinematus
description:
Kinematus is a simple 2.5D platformer, where you must tap your fingers on the left and right sides of the screen in order to navigate levels without dying. 

It is played like a traditional platformer, where the player must navigate to the end of the level safely, through portals, bounce pads, anti-gravity, traps, walls, and of course, platforms.

The game gets harder as levels progress, and additional sets of levels are planned for a future update.
